definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Thereare different forms of energy, one of which is atomic energy.
sentences.chinese: 有各種不同形式的能，原子能是其中之一。

sentences.english: The fissionable material defined by the preceding paragraph should be reported to the Atomic Energy Council once every half-year.
sentences.chinese: 前項可分裂物質，應每半年向原子能委員會申報一次。

sentences.english: Yukiya Amano, the International Atomic Energy Agency's director general, said the situation was "very serious".
sentences.chinese: 國際原子能機構總幹事天野之彌說情況“非常緊急”。

sentences.english: Approval from the Atomic Energy Council, Executive Yuan is required.
sentences.chinese: 應檢附行政院原子能委員會同意文件。

sentences.english: Nuclear energy is the bigest energy in the extant.
sentences.chinese: 原子能是現存的最大能源。

sentences.english: That is called the nuclear chain reaction.
sentences.chinese: 這被稱爲原子能的連鎖反應。

sentences.english: International Atomic Energy Agency, health care, with electronic "management" system to provide a source.
sentences.chinese: 原子能機構保健管理已與康源系統，以提供電子化。

sentences.english: The results of disassembling or disposal must be reported to AEC for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 其拆除及處理結果，應報由原子能委員會檢查。

sentences.english: Tehran insists the agency’s allegations are fabricated.
sentences.chinese: 德黑蘭堅持表示國際原子能機構的指控純屬捏造。

sentences.english: AEOI was in those days one of the most heavily funded programs in the country.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗原子能組織在當時是政府資助的最大項目。

sentences.english: The International Atomic Energy Agency described an accident ranked 7 as a major one.
sentences.chinese: 國際原子能機構將七級描述爲特大事故。

sentences.english: Investigation of atomic spectra yields atomic energy levels .
sentences.chinese: 原子光譜的研究能給出原子能級信息。
